Great post, Megan!

::Prowl::

Prowl turns his head as Iron Raptor declares=
 her find, walking over 
to Iron Raptor in time to hear Iris' comment on he=
r surprise.

The Maximal listens to Iris' explanation, glancing at Iron Rap=
tor as 
she looks at him. His comm-link was flashing with a message from 
B=
luestreak, but he was too busy to notice.

Questions were running through h=
is mind, his logic center trying to 
make sence of them. He frowns. It seem=
ed like a lose-lose situation. 
If one of Iron Raptor's beast modes won the=
 struggle, she die, and if 
neither of them won, she would remain like this=
 till one of them did.

He returns Iron Raptor's look, his eyes serious.

"=
And is there any way to make them stop fighting?" he asks Iris, 
looking do=
wn at the cracked screen.
